segments.text: How do you feel about the TV series ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , to be frank , I think it's sheer waste of time to watch it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I agree , but still a lot of people watch it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I don't think much of it .
segments.speaker: S2
